DESCRIPTION
Titan Punk is giant monster smash'em up made in Unity 2D (built to run in web browsers). This game is a solo hobby project still in an early development state. Many of the art assets are place holders and a lot of the player animations are janky.  I plan on hiring an artists down the road, but for now I'm focusing on t he gameplay.

Feedback appreciated!  Feel free to leave a comment, even if you don't have any constructive criticisms.  Even if it's a hobby game, I wish it to be as enjoyable as possible.  Smash on!

OBJECTIVE
SMASH PUNY HUMANS.
DESTROY FRAGILE STRUCTURES.
BE AWARD WITH CHAOS POINTS.
USES CHAOS POINTS TO UNLOCK ABILITIES AND AUGMENT.
